history.narrative: Law 7-200 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-564, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 29, 1988 and December 13, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 21, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-265 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
